title: It Was Her
description: Lost friendship, vanished family: the truth behind the betrayal will shake you to the core.For years, we were best friends, like sisters. Our children Harry and Scott grew up together. I was devastated when her husband, Rob, accepted a job in Scotland and told Michelle they had to relocate due to work. But we swore we would keep in touch every day.However, when the day of the move came, I never heard from Michelle again. She vanished from my life without a trace.Then today, just over a year later, I saw her, but Michelle denied knowing me. Even worse, she denied having a son. Was it her? I need to know what happened to Michelle and Scott and will stop at nothing to find out the truthâ€¦With twists and turns and shocking revelations, this gripping thriller will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end. Don't miss out on this emotional rollercoaster ride of a book.
author: Benjamin     Smith
